content:
Status

  • RVP drafts published

    • Latest draft at http://ds.internic.net/internet-drafts/draft-calsyn-rvp-01.txt

  • Next draft will reflect implementation

  • Microsoft is committed to developing an interoperable standard for Instant Messaging through the PIP (“Presence Information Protocol”) effort

    • Held BOF at last IETF
    • Asking for WG at August IETF
